'''''Yo-Ho-Ho, and a Bottle of Dandelion Wine''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to climb aboard their [[Waverider]].

==Trivia==
* The name "Yo-Ho-Ho, and a Bottle of Dandelion Wine" is a reference to "Yo-ho-ho, and a bottle of rum," a famous line of lyrics of the fictional sea song from {{w|Robert Louis Stevenson}}'s novel ''{{w|Treasure Island}}''.
